title: Devi Nakshi Kundan Haaram with Emerald Pendant
materials: Seed Pearls. Finished with our signature Hyderabadi Polish for an enduring luster.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases meticulous Nakshi work featuring Goddess Lakshmi motifs along the neckline. The elaborate kundan setting enhances the brilliance of the stones. The centerpiece is a stunning Emerald pendant surrounded by delicate seed pearl drops (Gundla). The entire piece features a temple jewelry design.
occasions: or any grand celebration. A treasured heirloom piece for generations to come. Suitable for modern occasions too
adding a touch of tradition and elegance.
description: Authentic Nakshi craftsmanship, reflecting South Indian heritage. High-quality Kundan stones for exceptional sparkle. Auspicious Lakshmi motifs bring blessings and prosperity. Durable 22K gold ensures lasting value. A statement piece that embodies tradition and elegance.
